turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hey al its me tom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: well good morning mr tom would you like a traffic report?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. i need a pick me up. i am driving into work and wanted some coffee and i needed a favor.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was wondering if you can place me a order so i can pick it up from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: abosolutly i can! witch starbucks will you be passing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one located at 20 N Summerlin Ave, Orlando

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: id love a Iced Caffè Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good choice. and how would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like it with 2% milk and n whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and do you know what time you will be passing the Summerlin Ave starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i should be there around 8:45.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so i have a coffee pickup from starbucks at 20 N Summerlin Ave here in orlando for a grande Iced Caffè Mocha 2% milk no whip cream at 8:45 is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes it is your amazing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you. you will get a text to confirm your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you have a good day al.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome. you too mr tom.
